response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value not only in monetary terms but also in its unique features and benefits that align perfectly with your needs. Given its significance, I propose a special introductory price of $9,500 for you, which I believe is a fair reflection of its true worth and an exceptional value for you. I am confident that this investment will yield significant returns and meet your expectations. Please let me know if you require any further information or assistance in making your decision.", "product_price": 9500}
